version_description:
Bugfixes:
Fixed a problem that prevented to share your PDFs with other Apps
Now, your file output folder won't disappear
Fixed an error that happened when trying to open a password protected PDF with the reader.

Bugfixes:
Fixed a problem that prevented to share your PDFs with other Apps
Now, your file output folder won't disappear
Fixed an error that happened when trying to open a password protected PDF with the reader.
Bugfixes & Improvements
Bugfixes & Improvements

New design! The user interface has been improved making easier work with the library.
We have been fixing some bugs too. Hope you like it!

New design! The user interface has been improved making easier work with the library.
We have been fixing some bugs too. Hope you like it!

New Feature: Manage your files from the Official Apple's Files App too
New Feature: Extract ZIP files directly from the App
New Feature: Autoscroll to file after a successful process
Bugfix: Now you can share files from a 3rd level folder
Bugfix: Fixed an error preventing import big files
And a few more bugfixes!

New Feature: Manage your files from the Official Apple's Files App too
New Feature: Extract ZIP files directly from the App
New Feature: Autoscroll to file after a successful process
Bugfix: Now you can share files from a 3rd level folder
Bugfix: Fixed an error preventing import big files
And a few more bugfixes!

- New colorful icons!
- New way to select all files in a folder and see selected files easily
- Improved performance
- Improved uploader and file processing
- Improved grid view
- New tools: PDF to Word, PDF to Excel and PDF to Powerpoint
- Fixed Split PDF bug when defining ranges
- Some bugfixing

- New colorful icons!
- New way to select all files in a folder and see selected files easily
- Improved performance
- Improved uploader and file processing
- Improved grid view
- New tools: PDF to Word, PDF to Excel and PDF to Powerpoint
- Fixed Split PDF bug when defining ranges
- Some bugfixing

• Brand new PDF Reader: Annotate PDF, Sign PDF, Fill PDF forms and edit PDF pages
• Improved performance
• Fixed iOS files app connection

• Brand new PDF Reader: Annotate PDF, Sign PDF, Fill PDF forms and edit PDF pages
• Improved performance
• Fixed iOS files app connection

• New Free PDF Reader
• New PDF tools: Sign PDF, Annotate PDF and Fill PDF form
• 11 New languages: list (depending on characters)
• Library Manager bug has been fixed
• Improved performance
• Merge PDF, Split PDF & convert PDF to JPG locally without using your mobile data

• New Free PDF Reader
• New PDF tools: Sign PDF, Annotate PDF and Fill PDF form
• 11 New languages: list (depending on characters)
• Library Manager bug has been fixed
• Improved performance
• Merge PDF, Split PDF & convert PDF to JPG locally without using your mobile data

• New Free PDF Reader
• New PDF tools: Sign PDF, Annotate PDF and Fill PDF form
• 11 New languages: list (depending on characters)
• Library Manager bug has been fixed
• Improved performance

• New Free PDF Reader
• New PDF tools: Sign PDF, Annotate PDF and Fill PDF form
• 11 New languages: list (depending on characters)
• Library Manager bug has been fixed

• Bugfixes

• Bugfixes
Fixed stability issues for Image to PDF
Fixed stability issues for Image to PDF

- NEW! Some tools now work offline to speed up processes.
- NEW! Split PDF has a new option to automatically merge documents after being split by ranges.
- Bug fixes to improve app stability.
- Minor usability fixes.
- Optimized app size up to 50% less for better compatibility

Este campo es obligatorio. 3722Vistas previas de la app y capturas de pantalla Las capturas de pantalla deben estar en formato JPG o PNG y en el espacio de color RGB. Las vistas previas de la app deben estar en formato M4V, MP4 o MOV y no pueden tener más de 500 MB. Más información
